lead_paragraph: Gareth Southgate's unique relationship with players in the England set-up makes him the right man for the job, West Ham United midfielder Michail Antonio has said.

headline.print_headline: West Ham's Antonio Tips Southgate for England Job
headline.main: West Ham's Antonio Tips Southgate for England Job

snippet: Gareth Southgate's unique relationship with players in the England set-up makes him the right man for the job, West Ham United midfielder Michail Antonio has said....
